title.rendered: Claire and Zac’s Timeless Spring Wedding

content.rendered:
Last spring, Claire and Zac had a timeless wedding at The Bridge Building with a gorgeous riverfront ceremony and reception full of blue details. 

Claire, from Illinois, and Zac, from Ohio, began their relationship after meeting at the company where they both work, LogoBrands. They dated for one year and got engaged the following winter! 

When it came to planning the big day, it was important to them that their guests had a good time and the day ran as smoothly as possible. 

The couple could hardly wait to say their “I dos.” On May 1, 2021, Claire wore a classic white gown with a deep v neckline and timeless updo. She held a bouquet of all white blooms with sprigs of greenery as she walked down the aisle to her now husband Zac, who was dressed in a sleek navy suit with a matching tie. 

For the ceremony, the pair exchanged their vows on The Bridge Building’s riverfront patio, decorated with a wooden cross adorned with floral arrangements and an unbeatable view of Downtown Nashville. 

After they were pronounced husband and wife, our team prepared the main space for dinner stations of gourmet sliders and other delectable in-house selections. The reception was set with blue table linens, ivory centerpieces, cascading spring lights, and vintage-inspired marquee letters of Claire and Zac’s initials!

The newlyweds later shared their first dance to “Beautiful Crazy” by Luke Combs before dancing the night away. 

When it was time to send off the bride and groom, guests made a tunnel of white shakers under the pedestrian bridge, which was only appropriate for the major Bama fan that Zac is, of course. 

Keep scrolling to see more of Claire and Zac’s timeless spring wedding day with blue details and all the personality!

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: May 1st, 2021
Bride & Groom: Claire and Zac
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 260
Colors: Light Blue, Navy Blue, and White
Photographer: Laura K Allen
Florist: Enchanted Florist
Cake: Nothing Bundt Cakes
Linens: Event Works Rentals
Entertainment: Southern Strings Trio + Prime Source Entertainment
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Kalyn | IH

excerpt.rendered: A spring wedding ceremony and reception with a timeless feel at the Bridge Building.
